p: Our primary analysis focuses on results from the Community Climate System Model version 4 (CCSM4), a coupled GCM with interactive atmospheric (i.e., Community Atmosphere Model 4; Neale et al., 2010), land (i.e., Community Land Model 4; Lawrence et al., 2011), ocean (i.e., Parallel Ocean Program 2; Smith et al., 2010), and sea‚Äêice (i.e., Community Ice CodE 4; Hunke & Lipscomb, 2008) components. The atmospheric component was run with both conventional convective parameterization (CAM) and superparameterization (SPCAM), which are described in more detail below. For a general description of conventional and superparameterized versions of the fully coupled CCSM4, see Gent et al. ( 2011) and Stan and Xu ( 2014), respectively.
